member.name: T:ParamAdjuster.valueHandler
member.summary: The delegate for the event when the slider has changed

member.name: T:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster
member.summary:
Description: A set of control elements. Used for simulating an adjusting unit for float variables.
Author: Rene Schulte
Version: 1.0
Last recent Update: 10-24-2004

member.name: E:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.onNewValue
member.summary: The event which is thrown when the scrollbar value has been changed

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.stepProp
member.summary: The step in which the Adjuster could be adjusted -> default: 0.1

member.name: F:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.step
member.summary: The step in which the Adjuster could be adjusted -> default: 0.1

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.minProp
member.summary: The minimum value for the adjuster -> default: 0.0

member.name: F:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.valueMin
member.summary: The minimum value for the adjuster -> default: 0.0

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.maxProp
member.summary: The maximum value for the adjuster -> default: 1.0

member.name: F:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.valueMax
member.summary: The maximum value for the adjuster -> default: 1.0

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.valueProp
member.summary: The current value of the adjuster

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.paramNameProp
member.summary: The name of the parameter which the adjuster represents -> default: "Paramter"

member.name: F:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.paramName
member.summary: The name of the parameter which the adjuster represents -> default: "Paramter"

member.name: P:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.roundingProp
member.summary: The number of digits the value is rounded -> default: 4

member.name: F:ParamAdjuster.ParamAdjuster.rounding
member.summary: The number of digits the value is rounded -> default: 4
